markdownRemark.html:
I’ve been trying to come up with a name for my application, and I used a spider diagram to get a lot of words onto a page that I could mess with and combine mentally.

I’ve ended up with the name Habeats. The reason I’ve chose this name is because a habit is repeating something over and over - repetition. With repetition you can get a beat. I’m aware this connection is a bit of a stretch so I’ll be using the tagline “Add Rhythm To Your Life” to help build the connection.

Habeats - Add Rhythm To Your Life
